name: ADARAN
description:
Winner of Newgrounds' PixelDay2017.

You're a devil-like creature trying to escape a hell-like place with brute force using your shuriken-like weapon.

Controls:
X - Throw
UP - Jump
M - Mute

Art & Game Design by Miroko

Programming & Game Design by Madnukin

Music & Sound Effects by Jason Létourneau
